channel.title: Need a no-ip hoster! [Paying USD cash]
channel.description:
hello, i need a hoster for my server. i just need you to host my server on a no-ip.com server. which i would like you to make a special IP for me. i will pay you by the hour it's up. i'm thinking maybe half of minimum wage for the USA(all you do is host my server it's not that labor intensive). i will not pay you first you must host my server for the first hour before i pay you(i've paid people to do stuff for me i wont scam, my names on the silab client list also i donated - my name is Mee443). I will test to make sure you can run a no-ip. i will ask for you to put up a server of my choice and let me play on it for about a minute. i will then send you my sourse(it will have all files but .CLASS left.)how to contact me.
EMAIL: mee443@hotmail.com
don't bother adding me if you have less then 20 rep, and are not a senior member :)
